DataElement.preferredName: Person Prior Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to prior action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process as an elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Prior Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to prior action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process as an elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Prior Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Study 2:  Up to 2 prior chemotherapy regimens with <=1 regimen for recurrent disease

ReferenceDocuments.name: >1prior chemotherapy regimen
ReferenceDocuments.description: >1prior chemotherapy regimen for breast cancer. >2 prior aromatase inhibitor regimens

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: >3 prior chemotherapy regimens for metastatic breast cancer.  >2 prior aromatase inhibitor regimens.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ALT - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant have hormonal cancer therapy or radiation therapy as prior cancer treatment within 5 years of registration? (Prior surgery, biologic therapy, hormonal therapy, or radiation therapy for a malignancy over 5 years prior to enrollment that is not considered cured is acceptable.)

ReferenceDocuments.name: EAF151 CRF
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been treated previously with immunotherapies (vaccines, checkpoint inhibitors, T-cells)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EAI141 CRF
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has participant been treated previously with immunotherapies (vaccines, checkpoint inhibitors, T-cells)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CITN
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has received any approved or investigational anti-cancer therapy within 14 days prior to initiation of study treatment

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient used androgens, progesterone analogs, or other appetite stimulants within the past month?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance A212102
ReferenceDocuments.description: No prior definitive systemic or local anti-cancer intervention

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has participant previously been treated with CTLA-4, PD-1 or PD-L1 inhibitors?
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has participant previously been treated with CTLA-4, PD-1 or PD-L1 inhibitors?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had any treatment with radiation therapy, chemotherapy, biotherapy, and/or endocrine therapy administered for the currently diagnosed breast cancer prior to study entry?
